entry.dcterms:subject: The data file contains both the data of the individual and household questionnaires. Variables beginning with "de" are from the individual questionnaire, while variables beginning with "dh" refer to the household questionnaire. The SELECT IF CSALALL = 1 command can be used to get the household file (in which each household occurs only in one line, a total of 1520 cases). The command SELECT IF EGYENI = 1 makes it possible to select those persons (a total of 3328 cases) who responded to the individual questionnaire.
